items.value: PAST PROGRESS WILL BE LOST. YOU WANT IT?
YOU'RE NOT GETTING PAID TODAY. REALLY GO OUT?
Hi, kid. You’re late at the very first day.
Well, it’s kinda tight from the bottom and it smells.
And I found a tooth and some nails, is that alright?
Alright, alright. You don’t wanna know what I’d found in my pizza. Anyway, let’s sum up, now you work for me and you do everything I say.
You are to hand out flyers and to attract customers. I’ll give you a limited number of flyers a day. According to my experience, a special kind of people will buy it and come.

You’ll see who you should flog it. And don’t worry; you’ll HEAR if something changes. So don’t waste your flyers on a wrong person. 3 mistakes and you’re fired. And don’t be a bum, hand them ALL out before the pizzeria closes.
Use the keys W, S, A, D to move! I didn't hire you to be wallflowers!
Left-click on a passerby to give a flyer! Now try to give it to anybody.
Excellent! You’ve learnt it all, now get to work. Don’t go too far at first.
Hey, are you trying to steal the suit?!
One more step and I’ll call the cops!!
You did well yesterday. Call the probation passed.
That’s awesome! So I finally get a normal suit?
Okay, listen, kid, now you’re a staff member and thus I will require in full from you. More flyers – more people, more people – more money, got it?
Which means it’s up to you! Go back to work, kid. I’ve got a pizza burning over there.
Hello. Kid. You’ve been doing your job really well last six month. I think bout getting you raise or maybe I shall buy you a new suit?
Nah, mine is okey, I’m gettin’ along with a moth that lives inside, so I’d choose raise!
No, thanks. I was gonna offer you some.
Are you kiddin’ me? Get outta here or I call the cops.
Wait-wait. You got me wrong. I wanna offer you a little job with flyers.
A little job, you say? Sounds dope, keep talkin’!
Anyway, there’s a club and we do there something… and it’ll be great if you help us to attract some new people by handing out flyers, you know.
A club of people doing something? Like seriously?
So what’s the problem? You do the job, we pay for it. What do you think?
Nah, man, sorry, I’m not lookin’ for troubles!
That’s gonna be dope! What about terms?
Great! Look, every day I will give you a bunch of flyers.
But you shouldn’t give them to just anybody, only to “special people”. What people? I’ll tell ya.
And remember, give the flyers only to them! 3 mistakes and we don’t work together anymore, get it?
Such a nice fellow you wеre...
Hello. Kid. You’ve been doing your job really well last six month...
Wait, wait, wait, I do remember this, the raise or a new suit...
Then a weird guy, a club…

You’d better quit playing videogames, kid. Who knows what they do to you! Anyway, you’ve been doing your job really well last six month. I think bout getting you raise or maybe I shall buy you a new suit?
Damn, maybe the new suit would be better.
You got the wrong guy, buddy.
Buddy? I am not your buddy. What do you want?
Anyway, there’s a club and we do there something… and it’ll be great if you help us to attract some new people by handing out flyers, you know.
A club of people doing something.. haha, funny shit.
So what’s the problem? You do the job, we pay for it. What do you think?
You know what, shove your something up your somewhere!
Such a nice fellow you were...
Hope you’ve got everything right; here are some flyers for the first time. Let’s see how’re you getting on.
Chill, man, I’m really good at it!
Listen, buddy, you’re doing great, huh! We even had somebody stopping by. You shoulda seen what he brought!
It must have been hard to you guys to carry that something in a club!?
Yeah well, it was harsh… Wait, what? Ah, forget it.
We talked it over and decided that we could pay you more but then you’ll get more flyers to hand out.
No problem, just bring them in time!!
What the hell, dude, who are you?
You know, you really did well to get to this moment...
You must be kidding me. What moment? What’s going on here? Is this some kind of show or game?
This is the end. But if you wanna to play more, you can use <the endless mode>...
Oh! I can’t live like this anymore. Where can I get some money to bring that all back to life?
